body:
Long story short, Manager want to fired FMC from the company since she did a lot mistake and company somehow need to reduce some employer. 

FMC said she will do anything to get her stay working, hearing that make Manager had a bad thought, his face obviously showing he kinda thinking something dirty, FMC saw that face and offer sex to supervisor(who is virgin). 

Later on FMC and Manager have sex at Manager house, he very beginner compared to FMC which is married and experienced in sex, while having sex FMC set up a cam in her bag, then exposed the video to the superior that the Manager took advantage on co-worker with his position to have sex. Manager who about to get promoted is executive position got fired later. 

The FMC got Manager career destroyed and she got promoted as a secretary and had a good life later.
